import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from './mapModal.module.scss' const MapModal = ({ onClose, onOrder, type, currentUser }) => { const [selectedAddress, setSelectedAddress] = useState('') const [selectedPoint, setSelectedPoint] = useState(null) const [comment, setComment] = useState('') // Пункты самовывоза const pickupPoints = [ { id: 1, name: 'РЦ НЛО', address: 'ул. Якуба Коляса, 37', coords: [53.9023, 27.5619], hours: 'Круглосуточно', image: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=53.9023,27.5619&zoom=15&size=300x200&markers=color:red%7C53.9023,27.5619', }, { id: 2, name: 'Машерова', address: 'пр-т. Машерова, 78', coords: [53.9094, 27.5767], hours: '10:00 - 23:00', image: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=53.9094,27.5767&zoom=15&size=300x200&markers=color:red%7C53.9094,27.5767', }, { id: 3, name: 'ТЦ Глобо', address: 'ул. Уманская, 54', coords: [53.8591, 27.4817], hours: '10:00 - 23:00', image: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=53.8591,27.4817&zoom=15&size=300x200&markers=color:red%7C53.8591,27.4817', }, { id: 4, name: 'ТЦ Моио', address: 'пр. Партизанская, 150а', coords: [53.8746, 27.5874], hours: '10:00 - 23:00', image: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=53.8746,27.5874&zoom=15&size=300x200&markers=color:red%7C53.8746,27.5874', }, { id: 5, name: 'Притыцкого', address: 'ул. Притыцкого, 83', coords: [53.9068, 27.4829], hours: '10:00 - 23:00', image: 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=53.9068,27.4829&zoom=15&size=300x200&markers=color:red%7C53.9068,27.4829', }, ] const handleOrder = () => { if (!selectedAddress) { alert('Пожалуйста, выберите адрес или пункт выдачи') return } if (type === 'pickup') { onOrder({ name: selectedPoint.name, address: selectedPoint.address, workingHours: selectedPoint.hours, }) } else { onOrder({ address: selectedAddress, comment: comment, phone: currentUser.phone, }) } } const handleAddressSelect = address => { setSelectedAddress(address) } return (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{type === 'pickup' ? 'Выберите пункт самовывоза' : 'Укажите адрес доставки'}

{type === 'pickup' ? (

{pickupPoints.map(point => (
{ setSelectedPoint(point) setSelectedAddress(`${point.name}, ${point.address}`) }} >

{point.address}

Время приготовления: 15-20 мин

))}

Введите адрес доставки

setSelectedAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder='Например: ул. Ленина, 15' required />
